name: Glide Finance
description: Glide Finance is a Decentralized Exchange / Automated Market Maker, Yield Farming, and Staking platform running on the Elastos Smart Chain (ESC) that aims to accelerate adoption of the Elastos ecosystem by acting as a source of liquidity for users and the projects built on it. We're invested in building a strong foundation with our GLIDE token as a governance token, diverse farms, a built in bridge, and more features down the line.
